name: [GAME] sandbox
description:
Hi, I'm Eva.

This game is made from a summer memory from my childhood. I just wanted it to be encapsulated inside this little piece of mechanics.

The goal of the game is to collect 22 notes. To collect them, you need to click on the "play" button and go to the sandbox level.

At the level, simply remove the sand and lower the girl's figurine below, to the stones (carefully, if you touch the upper or lower frame, the level will end).

A new note is obtained only if the girl's figurine has reached the stones below.

Inside the bag are a phone, a notebook and water.

In a notebook, you can pump traction (manually or auto), glow, visibility of coins and level value.

Upgrades are bought with coins collected in the level.

Thank you!

You can also download the source code of the game for Construct 2 and pictures.

I can be contacted here:

https://t.me/game_sunlight 

https://vk.com/gamesunlight
